name: Essence of Light
description: A concentrated form of luminescence captured from Tower luminescent creatures, used in potions and illumination spells.

name: Essence of Vitality
description: A potent essence extracted from the life force of Tower creatures, used in healing potions and rejuvenating rituals.

name: Monster Eye
description: Used in alchemy and crafting magical items.

name: Venom Extract
description: Highly concentrated venom extracted from the fangs of Tower predators, essential for crafting poisons and antidotes.

name: Phantom Dust
description: A fine, iridescent dust gathered from the remnants of spectral beings. It's used in invisibility potions and for binding elusive magical essences.

name: Dragon's Blood Resin
description: A sticky, ruby-hued resin exuded by fire-breathing drakes. Its potent magical properties make it a prized ingredient for fiery enchantments and potent potions.

name: Nether Bloom
description: A dark, otherworldly flower found in cursed groves. Its petals pulse with arcane energy, making it ideal for crafting shadow potions and hexes.
